name: A Divine Wager
description:
Play as Hades, Chthonic God of the Dead living by himself in the Underworld, when the elusive Hermes pays you a surprise visit. Can you divine Hermes' purpose and satisfy their curiosity, or will your clandestine meeting bear no fruit?

This game was made in one week for the 2021 edition of the Only One of Any Asset (O2A2) VN jam.

There are four choices and two possible endings.

Credits:

Leon (Itch | Twitter) - Writer and Background/Sprite Artist

Lyraden (Soundcloud | Itch | Twitter) - Composer and Sound Designer

Thank you for playing!
